definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 13:6 property, goods;—abs. [[רְכוּשׁ]] Nu 16:32 + , [[רְכֻשׁ]] Ge 14:16, Ge 14:21; cstr. [[רְכוּשׁ]] 2Ch 35:7, [[רְכֻשׁ]] Ge 14:11; sf. [[רְכֻשׁוֹ]] v:Ge 14:12 + , [[רְכוּשָׁם]] Ge 12:5 + , etc.;—property, goods, PRChr Dn Ge 14:
gen. Term for movable possessions of all kinds (oft. specif. incl. cattle), Ge 12:5, Ge 15:4, Nu 16:32, 1Ch 27:31, 1Ch 28:1, 2Ch 31:3, 2Ch 32:29, Ezr 8:21, Ezr 10:8.
used specif. of cattle, flocks, etc. Ge 13:6, Ge 31:18, Ge 36:7, Nu 35:3, 2Ch 35:7.
of stores, utensils, etc. Ge 46:6, Ezr 1:4, Ezr 1:6, as camp-baggage Da 11:13, esp. as booty Ge 14:11, Ge 14:12, Ge 14:16, Ge 14:16, Ge 14:21, 2Ch 20:25, 2Ch 21:14, 2Ch 21:17, Da 11:24, Da 11:28.
